name: Maple Bourbon Pecan Brittle
description: Indulge in the irresistible crunch of our Maple Bourbon Pecan Brittle, a decadent treat that masterfully combines roasted pecans, pure maple syrup, and a touch of small-batch bourbon. Each batch is handcrafted in copper kettles for a perfectly caramelized texture and a rich, buttery flavor profile. Enjoy it as a sophisticated snack, a unique dessert topping, or a memorable gift for food lovers. Gluten-free and free from artificial additives, this brittle delivers an authentic taste experience in every bite.
